main event: Three witnesses observed a luminous object maneuvering over their building in Chicago, Illinois on August 21, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to be approximately 8 feet in diameter and 3 feet thick,The illumination was similar to a 500 watt floodlight,The object seemed to hover and was motionless at times,An unspecified whirring sound was heard,The sighting lasted about 10 minutes before the object disappeared into the southeast.
sighted object: a luminous object that orbited and hovered
witness description: Illene C. Darnedy, Lyle Johnson, Norma Lehmk√ºhl
